brains_reddy wrote:

> Here is a sample code for what i am saying,
> public static void main(String[] args)
> {
> junit.textui.Testrunner.run(TestName.class);
> Finally{
> conn.close();
> }
> }

I believe that the test runner is invoking System.exit() -- and I agree 
that that's not good behavior -- and so the JVM ends before your finally 
{} block.

But this is not the way one intends the test runner to be used. Why are 
you trying to close a connection outside your tests?
